Text: The reason for all the confusion over episode order has become apparent, the group I have taken most of these episodes from, Cartoon_Palace, has been labelling them in the order thy have been released for viewing on HDTV while the other group, toongod who, until this weekend, had only released the hulk episode but have now released all 8, are using the order the episodes are listed on iTunes which has "breakout" pt 1 & pt 2 as E06 & 07 and "some assembly required" is  episode 08 from both sources. Hopefully both TV and iTunes will agree over the order of the rest of the series since it looks like it's just going to be 1 episode a week from now on.
